Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOPC) has been manufactured using a Ni-modified perovsldte and perovskite-based electrolyte and cathode.
Titulo: Electrochemical behaviour of an all-perovskite-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The SOFC has been investigated for operation at intermediate temperatures (800 degrees C).
Titulo: Electrochemical behaviour of an all-perovskite-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electrical properties of La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.2O3 (LSGM) perovskite have been compared to gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) electrolyte.
Titulo: Electrochemical behaviour of an all-perovskite-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This has allowed to validate the promising properties of the perovskite electrolyte compared to ceria-based ceramic membranes for operation at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Electrochemical behaviour of an all-perovskite-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The reliability of the Ni-modified La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3 perovskite-based anode for operation in combination with the LSGM electrolyte and a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3 (LSFC) cathode has been studied.
Titulo: Electrochemical behaviour of an all-perovskite-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A 50 h electrochemical test for the SOFC operating under different fuel feed compositions is reported.
Titulo: Electrochemical behaviour of an all-perovskite-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The all-perovskite SOFC shows promising fuel-flexibility characteristics.
Titulo: Electrochemical behaviour of an all-perovskite-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell
